meanings: (눈물·땀·피 등을) (눈물을) cry, shed, (땀을) sweat, (formal) perspire, (피를) bleed, (침을) drool, slobber

vlive.korean: 흘리면... If it drips... 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 더비 안녕?😉
어떻게 해야 되죠? - 흘리면 안 돼! What needs to be done? - You can't spill it. 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : IZ*ONE 에너지 캠(ENOZI Cam) EP.41
vlive.english: What needs to be done? - You can't spill it.

vlive.korean: 다시 한 번 말하지만 조수가 피를 흘리면 뭐다? Let me remind you, what does it mean when the assistant bleeds while helping with the graduation exhibition? 듣기 View video 플레이리스트 (Playlist) : 내 운명이라는 남자가 날 쌩깠다 [나의 이름에게] - EP.01
vlive.english: Let me remind you, what does it mean when the assistant bleeds while helping with the graduation exhibition?

vlive.korean: 흘리면 닦으면 되죠 뭐 그렇죠? If I drop things, I can clean it later. Right? 듣기 View video 이달의 소녀(LOONA) : [이달의소녀탐구] 500회특집! 이달의 탐구왕
vlive.english: If I drop things, I can clean it later. Right?

vlive.korean: 여름에는 땀 흘리면 찝찝하잖아요. During the summer, sweat sort of makes you discomforted. 듣기 View video DAY6 : 도공공장공장장🐶🛠 Ep. 2
vlive.english: During the summer, sweat sort of makes you discomforted.

examples.korean: If you spill coffee on the carpet, it will stain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 카펫에 커피를 흘리면 자국이 남는다 Neungyule

examples.korean: When you perspire profusely, you become thirsty soon. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 땀을 너무 많이 흘리면 목이탄다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary

examples.korean: When you sweat, your body loses important vitamins and water. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 땀을 흘리면 신체가 중요 비타민과 수분을 잃어버립니다. Neungyule

examples.korean: Perspiration helps cool the body down. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 땀을 흘리면 체온이 낮아진다. Neungyule
